/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. A red banner, adorned with Chinese characters, hangs prominently on the right side of the street, adding a splash of color to the scene. On the left side of the street, a white car is parked, its presence adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise tranquil setting. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene and enhancing the overall mood of the image.
